content: ribbing from the stitches you cast on at the underarm in step 41 approx a further next you will work the second sleeve 3 rounds of your wrap 67 with 6 5mm us10 5 circular size 1 only needles with the right side of your wrap facing you and working from left 63 decrease round change to 5mm to right transfer the 30 31 32 34 us8 circular needles hmake a stitches held on the waste yarn for the right-leaning decrease purl 1 stitch second sleeve onto your needles and knit 1 stitch purl 1 stitch make a re-join your yarn right-leaning decrease purl 1 stitch h repeat the section inside the stars now you will be working across h a further 5 times knit 1 stitch these 30 31 32 34 stitches for the purl 1 stitch 38 stitches second sleeve simply leave the rest of the stitches on the waste yarn you will come back to them later sizes 2 3 & 4 only 30 31 32 34 stitches 64 decrease round change to 5mm 68 repeat steps 23 to 66 for your second us8 circular needles knit 0 0 1 sleeve stitch es purl 0 0 1 stitch es make a right-leaning decrease hpurl next you will create the rib around 1 stitch knit 1 stitch purl 1 stitch the body of your piece make a right-leaning decrease h repeat the section inside the stars 69 with the right side of your wrap facing h a further 8 times purl 1 stitch you and working from right to left make a right-leaning decrease purl first transfer the front section stitches how to make your perfect sense wrap 15 38 40 42 45 stitches and then the 71 decrease round place your yarn back section stitches 38 40 42 45 marker make a left-leaning decrease stitches from the waste yarn onto make a left-leaning purl decrease your 5mm us8 circular knitting then starting with a knit stitch work needles 40 40 42 42 stitches in 1x1 rib stitch 70 increase round starting at the right back sloped raglan edge pick up and make a left-leaning decrease make knit 20 stitches along the back sloped a left-leaning purl decrease make a raglan edge 8 8 10 10 stitches left-leaning decrease make a left- along the straight underarm edge and leaning purl decrease then starting 20 stitches along the front sloped with a knit stitch work 42 44 46 50 raglan edge then working across stitches in 1x1 rib stitch the 38 40 42 45 held front section stitches starting with a knit stitch make a left-leaning decrease make work 0 2 2 2 stitches in 1x1 rib a left-leaning purl decrease make a stitch hknit 1 stitch purl 1 stitch left-leaning decrease make a left- make an increase purl 1 stitch h leaning purl decrease then starting repeat the section inside the stars with a knit stitch
